attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Put Joanna Lumley forward for a  life peerage, for her services to politics and this country.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
